  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    AddPartToAssociated(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Add Button" Functionality Clicking the add button will populate the selected part into the "AssociatedPartsTableView" by adding it to the "tempAssociatedPartsList" list
    static void
    associatePartsToProduct(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> tempAssociatedPartsList)
    This method loops through the "tempAssociatedPartsList" list and adds each part to the "associatedParts" list for that product
    private void
    fillProductInfo()
    Fills the text fields with information of the selected product Updates "AllPartsTableView" to match the "MainPartsTable" table view on the main menu, The parts associated with the selected product are loaded into a temporary list which holds any changes until saved or canceled, The "AssociatedPartsTableView" displays the "tempAssociatedPartsList"
    void
    initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    Initializes controller Updates "AllPartsTableView" to match the "MainPartsTable" table view on the main menu, The parts associated with the selected product are loaded into a temporary list which holds any changes until saved or canceled, The "AssociatedPartsTableView" displays the "tempAssociatedPartsList"
    void
    ModifyProductsCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Cancel Button" Functionality Any information entered is not saved and user is redirected back to the main menu screen (MainMenu.fxml), Clears "tempAssociatedPartsList" list and no changes are saved.
    void
    PartsSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "PartsSearchTF" Functionality This method takes user input from the "PartSearchTF" and checks for matches.
    static void
    productToModify(Product selectedProduct)
    mProduct is updated to the selected product sent over from "MainController"
    void
    RemoveAssociatedButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Remove Associated Part" Functionality This method removes the selected part in "AssociatedPartsTableView" on button click, asks user for confirmation, and alerts user if nothing is selected.
    void
    SaveProductInfo(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Save Button" Functionality On button click, this method gets user input from the text fields, validates the input and alerts the user if needed, converts strings to int/double data types as needed, adds new product and associated parts if all validation checks are passed, and sends user back to the Main Menu (MainMenu.fxml).

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • productToModify

      public static void productToModify(Product selectedProduct)
      mProduct is updated to the selected product sent over from "MainController"
      Parameters:

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes controller Updates "AllPartsTableView" to match the "MainPartsTable" table view on the main menu, The parts associated with the selected product are loaded into a temporary list which holds any changes until saved or canceled, The "AssociatedPartsTableView" displays the "tempAssociatedPartsList"
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      resourceBundle -
      url -

    • fillProductInfo

      private void fillProductInfo()
      Fills the text fields with information of the selected product Updates "AllPartsTableView" to match the "MainPartsTable" table view on the main menu, The parts associated with the selected product are loaded into a temporary list which holds any changes until saved or canceled, The "AssociatedPartsTableView" displays the "tempAssociatedPartsList"

    • PartsSearch

      public void PartsSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Provides "PartsSearchTF" Functionality This method takes user input from the "PartSearchTF" and checks for matches. Tableview "AllPartsTableView" is populated with matching search results.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • AddPartToAssociated

      public void AddPartToAssociated(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Provides "Add Button" Functionality Clicking the add button will populate the selected part into the "AssociatedPartsTableView" by adding it to the "tempAssociatedPartsList" list
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • RemoveAssociatedButton

      public void RemoveAssociatedButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Provides "Remove Associated Part" Functionality This method removes the selected part in "AssociatedPartsTableView" on button click, asks user for confirmation, and alerts user if nothing is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • SaveProductInfo

      public void SaveProductInfo(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Provides "Save Button" Functionality On button click, this method gets user input from the text fields, validates the input and alerts the user if needed, converts strings to int/double data types as needed, adds new product and associated parts if all validation checks are passed, and sends user back to the Main Menu (MainMenu.fxml).
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • associatePartsToProduct

      public static void associatePartsToProduct(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> tempAssociatedPartsList)
      This method loops through the "tempAssociatedPartsList" list and adds each part to the "associatedParts" list for that product
      Parameters:
      tempAssociatedPartsList -

    • ModifyProductsCancel

      public void ModifyProductsCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Provides "Cancel Button" Functionality Any information entered is not saved and user is redirected back to the main menu screen (MainMenu.fxml), Clears "tempAssociatedPartsList" list and no changes are saved.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
